name: Pre-sql
Post-sql
value:
call cdp_dwh.cancellations(
cast(to_char(current_date - interval '2 month','YYYYMM') as integer), 
cast(to_char(current_date - interval '2 month','YYYYMM')||'01' as integer),
cast(to_char(current_date - interval '2 month','YYYYMM')||'31' as integer));


call cdp_dwh.cancellations(
cast(to_char(current_date - interval '1 month','YYYYMM') as integer), 
cast(to_char(current_date - interval '1 month','YYYYMM')||'01' as integer),
cast(to_char(current_date - interval '1 month','YYYYMM')||'31' as integer));


call cdp_dwh.cancellations(
cast(to_char(current_date,'YYYYMM') as integer), 
cast(to_char(current_date,'YYYYMM')||'01' as integer),
cast(to_char(current_date,'YYYYMM')||'31' as integer));
